name: EyeExamWithEvidenceOfRetinopathyHDCPT
title: Eye Exam With Evidence of Retinopathy HD CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Eye Exam With Evidence of Retinopathy CPT Codes that constitute the Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Dilated retinal eye exam with interpretation by an ophthalmologist or optometrist documented and reviewed; with evidence of retinopathy (DM)
7 standard field stereoscopic retinal photos with interpretation by an ophthalmologist or optometrist documented and reviewed; with evidence of retinopathy (DM)
Eye imaging validated to match diagnosis from 7 standard field stereoscopic retinal photos results documented and reviewed; with evidence of retinopathy (DM)
